Name: Cave Explorers
About the game: Play as a member of the Cave Explorers. A team of specialist puzzle solvers who's role is to dodge traps and decipher clues in order to unlock hidden rooms and treasures for archaeologists to study. Cave Explorers contains a wide variety of puzzles that will test your mechanical, intellectual and logic problem solving skills. There are a number of unique zones to explore including: Desert, arctic, rainforest and a mystery zone.

Meta Description: Looking for information on Cave Explorers? Check out the release date (Oct 8, 2021), developer insights from MarkV, and a complete game summary.
